threats.description: Participants may improve performance across sessions due to familiarity with tasks and IDE environment
mitigation_strategies: Counterbalanced task order using Latin square design across participants
Minimum 48-hour interval between sessions to reduce immediate learning effects
Different but equivalent stimuli sets for each session (validated for complexity)
Statistical control for session order as a covariate in all analyses
threats.assessment_method: Mixed-effects modeling with session as random factor

threats.description: Eye tracker accuracy may degrade during long sessions affecting data quality
mitigation_strategies: Automated drift correction every 10 minutes using 4-point validation
Real-time gaze quality monitoring with < 1.0Â° threshold
Session interruption and recalibration if accuracy drops below threshold
Post-hoc drift correction using fixation-based algorithms
Quality metrics logged for each trial (accuracy, precision, data loss)
threats.assessment_method: Continuous quality monitoring with statistical process control

threats.description: Laboratory environment may not reflect real-world programming contexts
mitigation_strategies: Use of authentic enterprise codebases from open-source projects
Realistic time pressure and interruption patterns
Professional-grade development environment setup
Tasks based on real software engineering scenarios from industry partners
Post-session interviews to assess task authenticity and engagement
threats.assessment_method: Qualitative validation through expert programmer review

threats.description: Participants may alter natural behavior due to awareness of being monitored
mitigation_strategies: Extended habituation period (15 minutes) before data collection
Cover story emphasizing code quality assessment rather than monitoring
Unobtrusive eye tracking setup with minimal visual cues
Natural think-aloud protocol to maintain cognitive engagement
Comparison with baseline coding session without monitoring

threats.description: Eye movements, muscle activity, and environmental noise may contaminate EEG signals
mitigation_strategies: High-density electrode array (64 channels) for advanced spatial filtering
Independent Component Analysis (ICA) for artifact removal
Simultaneous EOG recording for eye movement artifact identification
EMG monitoring for muscle artifact detection and removal
Shielded recording chamber to minimize electromagnetic interference
Real-time impedance monitoring with automatic alerts
threats.assessment_method: Automated artifact detection with manual expert review

threats.description: Researcher knowledge of participant expertise may bias data interpretation
mitigation_strategies: Blinded data analysis with anonymized participant codes
Automated preprocessing pipelines to minimize subjective decisions
Independent analysis by multiple researchers
Pre-registered analysis plan with specified exclusion criteria
Machine learning classification to avoid human bias in expertise assessment
threats.assessment_method: Inter-rater reliability assessment for subjective measures

internal_validity.justification: Strong experimental control with randomization, counterbalancing, and statistical controls for confounding variables

external_validity.justification: Authentic tasks and realistic programming environments, though laboratory setting limits generalizability

construct_validity.justification: Multi-modal convergent validation using eye tracking, EEG, and behavioral measures
validation_evidence: Factor analysis of cognitive load measures

statistical_conclusion_validity.justification: Adequate sample size, appropriate statistical methods, and control for multiple comparisons

limitation_acknowledgments.limitation: Cross-sectional design limits causal inference about expertise development
limitation_acknowledgments.impact: Cannot establish developmental trajectories or training effectiveness
limitation_acknowledgments.future_research: Longitudinal study design with novice programmer tracking

limitation_acknowledgments.limitation: Laboratory setting may not capture full complexity of real-world development
limitation_acknowledgments.impact: Potential reduction in ecological validity for some findings
limitation_acknowledgments.future_research: Field studies using mobile eye tracking in actual workplaces

limitation_acknowledgments.limitation: Limited to specific programming languages and paradigms
limitation_acknowledgments.impact: Generalizability to other languages or paradigms uncertain

limitation_acknowledgments.limitation: Cultural bias in task design may affect cross-cultural validity
limitation_acknowledgments.impact: Results may not generalize across different cultural programming practices
limitation_acknowledgments.future_research: Culture-specific validation with locally relevant tasks

participant_wellbeing: Regular breaks to prevent eye strain and fatigue
Right to withdraw without penalty at any time
Debriefing on study purpose and individual results
data_protection: Secure storage with encryption and access controls
Retention policy with automatic deletion after 10 years
Participant consent for data sharing and reuse
potential_risks: Minimal risk of eye strain from extended screen viewing
Low risk of anxiety from performance monitoring
Negligible risk from EEG electrode application
